DOC.brief_summary: Cryopreservation embryos create fresh IVF cycle provide less expensive time-intensive opportunity pregnancy . Ideal endometrium thickness key point optimization FET cycle . Researches show endometrial thickness le 7mm , pregnancy rate drop significantly . Tamoxifen report oestrogenic low genital tract . Several study intrauterine insemination ovulation induction suggest tamoxifen may promise alternative patient thin endometrium . Based , want evaluate effect tamoxifen endometrial thickness pregnancy outcome woman fail develop adequate endometrial thickness previous frozen embryo transfer cycle twice even time willing another attempt .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Tamoxifen Clinical Outcome Women With Thin Endometrium Undergoing Frozen Thawed Cycle .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To investigate effect tamoxifen endometrial thickness pregnancy outcome woman thin endometrium undergo frozen thaw cycle . Study design : This single center , randomize control clinical trial . We plan recruit 100 patient Mar 2017 Dec 2019 , fail develop adequate endometrial thickness previous frozen embryo transfer cycle twice even time willing another attempt , divide two group , one prepare endometrium ovulation induction tamoxifen progesterone ( Study Group ) , hormone replacement cycle ( control group ) . Intervention : Study Group give endometrial preparation tamoxifen progesterone , control group prepare estrogen progesterone supplementation . Main outcome measure : The primary outcome study endometrium thickness clinical pregnancy rate , secondary outcome cycle duration , cycle cancellation rate , implantation rate , miscarriage rate , live birth rate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age ≥20 year ≤40 year ; 2. patient least 1 high quality blastocyst ; 3. patient observed endometrial thickness ≤ 7mm past natural cycle hormone replacement cycle repeatedly ( twice even ) ; 4. patient intend continue attempt another frozen embryo transfer cycle . 1. patient diagnosed intrauterine adhesion , uterine scar diverticulum via Hysteroscopy ultrasonography history uterine cavity operation indication ; 2. patient congenital uterine anomaly Gemini , mediastinum uterus .
